creator: srini_gm@yahoo.com
text:
When a cleint sends a request to a servlet (server), which is deployed on 
Tomcat 5.0, client is receiving a response "HTTP Version not supported". Is 
there any way that I can turn debug?

You need to capture whatever your client is sending. It is highly likely that
the requests are bad (or more precisely, that it has a problem with keepalive).

Please reopen if you can provide an example of valid requests which would
reproduce the issue.
creator: remm@apache.org
